content: Welcome to NETSCOUT’s first quarter fiscal year 2022 conference call for the period ended June 30, 2021. Our first quarter fiscal year 2022 gross profit margin was 74.2%, down 0.4 percentage points over the same quarter last fiscal year as inventory associated with discontinued products was reserved. Quarterly operating expenses increased 2.4% from the prior fiscal year, largely due to variable sales compensation and increased cost associated with our first quarter sales kick off and Engage events. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. Your line is now open.
